attributes.action: To increase grades due to online learning and the covid 19 situation
attributes.additional_details: Because the stress and pressure that students have been under are huge, students have missed learning in schools/ colleges, meaning they haven’t had the best interaction with there teachers in order to get the help they need. It’s been a difficult start to the year of these students.
attributes.background: To increase the grades from any GCSE/A level or functional skills. Due to the stress of Covid and the online lessons which have affected the ability to get the grade that each student deserves. Let them off marks from passing.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551838
